This app does not require internet connectivity and works completely offline to protect your privacy.

NFC Scanner v2.0.0

A comprehensive NFC tag scanner, manager, and emulator with advanced features.

Features:
• Scan and read NFC tags
• View detailed tag information
• Save scan history
• Emulate existing tags
• Write data to new tags
• Export/import data
• Advanced search and filtering

Built with Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and modern Android architecture.
